resources.string: We don\'t have any idea of the weather conditions at your location, so we can\'t recommend anything. That\'s okay, It\'s not like you depend on us for living or something like that. Just do what you wanna do.
We don\'t have any recommendations for now. But know that can do anything you want! Go ahead, the world is yours!
Okay, so the forecast told us there is a %1$s at your location. Maybe worrying about fancy activities might not be the best thing to do at the moment. We hope you are okay.
With the current temperature of %1$d°C and %2$s, It\'s a great day for going to the beach! Don\'t forget your sunscreen!
It\'s %1$d°C outside and raining. What about making some microwave popcorn (I heard microwaves have a button just for that) and watch something on your favorite streaming platform?

It\'s not raining and about %1$d°C outside, temperature which the writer of this recommendation finds pretty comfortable for biking or walking on the park. If you think that too, take that as a suggestion!
Well, it\'s %1$d°C outside and the weather is clear. Why don\'t you get that checkered towel, a straw basket, fruits, wine, that nice company and go on a picnic?
%1$d°C and %2$s means just one thing: fondue. Okay, maybe it could mean a thousand other things, but you got it. Just google \'fondue\' and give it a try!
Maybe %1$d°C is not the best weather for outdoor stuff, but going on indoor activities can be really nice. What about going to a nice restaurant, shopping or even indoor climbing?
We couldn\'t retrieve the UV data right now. But you should wear sunscreen anyway, just in case!
No need for sunscreen, the sun is being nice at this time!
Remember to put sunscreen! The UV index is Moderate.
Remember to put sunscreen and avoid sun exposure between 10am and 4pm! The UV index is High.
Remember to put A LOT OF sunscreen and avoid sun exposure between 10am and 4pm! The UV index is Very High
Put a LOT of sunscreen every 2 hours. Avoid sun exposure! The UV index is EXTREME. Are you sure you want to leave your house now?
It\'s kinda hot, you should wear something fresh!
The weather is nice! You can wear anything you like!
For comparing anything, you must choose a city first. Tap me!
We don\'t have any idea of the weather conditions at this location yet. We are terribly sorry. Come back later to check if we manage to do it!
Awww, aren\'t %1$s and %2$s cute? They are about the same temperature! Lovely.
%1$s is wetter than %2$s. It may be a little easier to breathe at where you are right now.
%1$s is a lot wetter than %2$s. It may be a much easier to breathe at where you are right now.
%1$s is drier than %2$s. It may be a little harder to breathe at where you are right now.
%1$s is much more drier than %2$s. It may be harder to breathe at where you are right now.
1$s and %2$s are about the same humidity!
Also, %1$s has %2$d less characters than %3$s. Just thought you would want to know.
Also, %1$s has %2$d more characters than %3$s. Just thought you would want to know.
Also, %1$s and %2$s have the same amout of characters. Just thought you would want to know.
User defined periodic weather reminders and tips
mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, sat, sun
